name: Pentagorat
description:
An isometric adventure for Commodore VIC-20 home computer

( 32KB RAM expansion is needed ) .

You wake up and you cannot remember where you are.. you are a prisoner of the castle of Pentagorat.

Code : Mika "Misfit" Keränen

Audio : Mika "Misfit" Keränen

Art : Mika "Misfit" Keränen

Loader : Daniel Kahlin

Tested :

- VICE emulator (PAL and NTSC)

- Real VIC (PAL)

- move = UP,DOWN,LEFT,RIGHT

- jump = fire

- search = push

Buy a physical copy

If you use your real VIC-20 sd2iec is your choice to load D64-files.

Thanks to all these people who donated and gave motivation to create new retro games

I've worked for a year on this. So be gentle and donate something..
